title: Jacket
description: beige linen bottom sections; heavy wool; large geometric embroidery in dark blue and orange on beige cotton; applique on top front and back and on large wide sleeves; attached shawl is 10-1/2\" x 8-1/2\" linen with rows of geometric and floral tape bordering a center beige cotton applique; long and narrow woven and wound trim (10) hang from shawl, two with metal discs
